subject: We are TBOXSHOP, selling sim racing equipment in Moscow, Russia.
description_text:
Hello! We are  TBOXSHOP.RU  , selling sim racing equipment in Moscow, Russia. We are currently receiving inquiries from our customers about your pedals and equipment; we would like to purchase directly from you. We have an agent in China for fast payment and a warehouse. Please send us a wholesale price list with prices in USD and RMB. We look forward to long-term cooperation.
My WeChat ID:  skamik88
 
 
Ваш магазин тюнинга Tboxshop.ru
Телефон:  +7(985)075-08-06
WhatsApp:  +7(903)9-687-687

conversations.body_text: Hi,     Thank you for reaching out and for your interest in cooperating with Simsonn! We’re glad to hear that your customers are asking about our pedals and products.  Could you please let us know which products you’re interested in and the estimated order quantity for each? We will then prepare a wholesale quotation for you in both USD and RMB based on your requested quantities.  Once confirmed, we can communicate further via WeChat (skamik88) or email to finalize details such as shipping and payment through your China-based agent.  Looking forward to building a successful long-term partnership with you.  Here is a reference table (excluding shipping costs).     Best regards, The Simsonn Team
